findings: Manual data entry between ERP and CRM creates 4-hour delays
Order validation requires 3 separate system checks
Order confirmations sent manually via email
No automated status updates to customers
Support tickets not linked to orders
Stock levels updated via CSV import twice daily
Reorder points calculated manually in spreadsheets
Weekly reports compiled manually from 5 data sources
Historical data siloed in department spreadsheets

recommended_fixes.fix: Implement bi-directional API integration between ERP and CRM
recommended_fixes.impact: Eliminate 4-hour processing delays, reduce errors by 90%

recommended_fixes.fix: Build automated order status notification system with webhooks
recommended_fixes.impact: Reduce support calls by 40%, improve customer satisfaction

recommended_fixes.fix: Real-time inventory sync across all warehouse systems
Automated data warehouse with real-time dashboards
recommended_fixes.impact: Save 8+ hours weekly, enable data-driven decisions

executive_summary.key_finding: Manual processes across order management, inventory, and reporting are creating $8,500/month in operational bleed through labor inefficiency, processing delays, and inventory discrepancies.
